lead_paragraph: The Boston Bruins yesterday signed the 6-foot-9 defenseman Zdeno Chara and center Marc Savard. Chara, 29, received a five-year deal worth $37.5 million. Savard, 28, left Atlanta to sign a four-year deal. Chara, the N.H.L.'s tallest player, had a career-best 43 points last season for Ottawa. Savard had career-highs of 28 goals and 69 assists.
